'''Of the Human Heart Many Essays Written''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''.

To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the World Quests ''[[Paleontological Investigation in The Chasm]]'', ''[[Mycological Investigation in The Chasm]]'', and ''[[Hydrological Investigation in The Chasm]]'', and obtain the [[Akademiya Recommendation Letter]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement in Chinese comes from a phrase meaning "To completely understand worldly matters is a branch of knowledge, to thoroughly master human relationships is an essay" {{lang|zh=世事洞明皆学问, 人情练达即文章|zh_rm=shìshì dòng míng jiē xuéwèn, rénqíng liàndá jí wénzhāng}}, which is from the famous Chinese novel {{w|Dream of the Red Chamber}}.
